00052 /*
00053 #define PA_UpdatePad() ExPad = CompletePad;\
00054    CompletePad = ~(BUTTONS + (((IPC->buttons)&3) << 10));\
00055    UPDATEPAD(Pad.Held, CompletePad);\
00056    UPDATEPAD(Pad.Released, (ExPad & (~CompletePad)));\
00057    UPDATEPAD(Pad.Newpress, (CompletePad & (~ExPad)));
00058 
00059 #define PA_UpdateStylus() u8 temp = ((~IPC->buttons) >> 6) & 1;\
00060        Stylus.Newpress = temp & (!Stylus.Held);\
00061        Stylus.Released = (!temp) & Stylus.Held;\
00062        Stylus.Held = temp;\
00063        if(Stylus.Held)Stylus.altX =  ((IPC->touchX - 0x0113) / 14);\
00064        if(Stylus.Held)Stylus.altY =  ((IPC->touchY - 0x00E0) / 19);\
00065        if(Stylus.Held)Stylus.X =  IPC->touchXpx;\
00066        if(Stylus.Held)Stylus.Y =  IPC->touchYpx;\
00067        if(Stylus.Held)Stylus.Pressure = (((Stylus.X * IPC->touchZ2) >> 6) / IPC->touchZ1) - (Stylus.X >> 6);
00068 */

00157 extern inline u8 PA_MoveSpriteDistance(u8 sprite, u8 distance){
00158        PA_MoveSpriteType = 1; // mode distance
00159        u8 touched = PA_MoveSpriteEx(PA_Screen, sprite, distance, distance);
00160        PA_MoveSpriteType = 0; // normal mode
00161        return touched;
00162 }

00194 extern inline u8 PA_SpriteStylusOverEx(u8 sprite, u8 lx, u8 ly){
00195        return ((Stylus.X > PA_GetSpriteX(PA_Screen, sprite)) && (Stylus.X < PA_GetSpriteX(PA_Screen, sprite) + lx)&& (Stylus.Y > PA_GetSpriteY(PA_Screen, sprite)) && (Stylus.Y < PA_GetSpriteY(PA_Screen, sprite) + ly));
00196 }
00197 
00198 
00199 
00215 extern inline u8 PA_SpriteTouchedEx(u8 sprite, u8 lx, u8 ly){
00216        return (Stylus.Held && PA_SpriteStylusOverEx(sprite, lx, ly));
00217 }
00218 
00219 
00220 
00229 extern inline u8 PA_SpriteTouched(u8 sprite) {
00230        return PA_SpriteTouchedEx(sprite, PA_GetSpriteLx(PA_Screen, sprite), PA_GetSpriteLy(PA_Screen, sprite));
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00234 
00243 extern inline u8 PA_SpriteStylusOver(u8 sprite) {
00244        return PA_SpriteStylusOverEx(sprite, PA_GetSpriteLx(PA_Screen, sprite), PA_GetSpriteLy(PA_Screen, sprite));
00245 }
00246 
00247 
00248 
00249 extern inline u8 PA_SpriteTouchedPix(u8 sprite){
00250 s16 spritex = PA_GetSpriteX(PA_Screen, sprite);
00251 s16 spritey = PA_GetSpriteY(PA_Screen, sprite);
00252 if (spritex >= 458) spritex -=511; // normalize the X coordinate...
00253 if (spritey >= 220) spritey -=256; // normalize the y coordinate...
00254 u16 x = Stylus.X - spritex;
00255 u16 y = Stylus.Y - spritey;
00256 
00257 return (Stylus.Held && (x < spriteanims[PA_Screen][sprite].lx) && (y < spriteanims[PA_Screen][sprite].ly) && PA_GetSpritePixel(PA_Screen, sprite, x, y));
00258 }

00280 #define PA_StylusInZone(x1, y1, x2, y2) ((Stylus.X>=x1)&&(Stylus.Y>=y1)&&(Stylus.X<x2)&&(Stylus.Y<y2))
